564250.name: Yooka-Laylee Soundtrack
564250.description:
Yooka-Laylee’s mouth-watering (ear-leaking?) soundtrack combines three of gaming’s greatest composers, the legendary David Wise (Donkey Kong Country, Diddy Kong Racing), equally esteemed Banjo-Kazooie composer Grant Kirkhope (Viva Piñata, GoldenEye 007) and the award-winning Steve Burke (Kameo: Elements of Power).

This is one musical performance you definitely don’t want to miss!
564250.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
